seeAlso.description: Output a tree of files and directories by providing an object. Especially useful for testing with real files.
Creates a temporary folder inside cwd, cds inside the folder, runs a function, and removes the folder. Especially useful for testing.
A wrapper around jest-image-snapshot that makes it compatible to Mocha.
Adjusts a Mocha output so that it is consistent across platforms and can be used for snapshot testing. Basically adjusts the checkmark symbol and removes time values.
Temporarily overrides the command line arguments. This is useful for testing.
